name: Perfect Simple Roasted Pork Chops
author: Rhonda Elaine
summary: Don't let the simplicity of this recipe fool you. Served with a salad and a fast side dish, these pork chops are perfect for a busy weeknight, and my children love it.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons dried thyme, lightly crushed, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Sprinkle chops on all sides with thyme, salt, and pepper
Bake in the preheated oven until a meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of a pork chop reads 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), about 20 minutes
Tent aluminum foil over the chops and let rest 5 to 10 minutes before serving
